entry.title: Impressions of ICRA 2019 Workshop - Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots

link.title: Impressions of ICRA 2019 Workshop - Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots

entry.content:
Full day workshop "Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots" at ICRA 2019 (May 23/24, 2019) in Montreal, Canada.

The workshop was a huge success for us and I was proud to be one of the main organizers of this event. We managed to gather an exciting group of speakers and real robots. For more information you can visit the website below and I also included some impressions from the workshop here.

Workshop website: https://icra2019wslocomotion.wordpress.com
entry.summary: Full day workshop "Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots" at ICRA 2019 (May 23/24, 2019) in Montreal, Canada.

entry.title: Call for Contribution at ICRA 2019 Workshop - Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots

link.title: Call for Contribution at ICRA 2019 Workshop - Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots

entry.content:
Call for contribution at full day workshop "Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots" at ICRA 2019 (May 23/24, 2019) in Montreal, Canada.

Workshop website: https://icra2019wslocomotion.wordpress.com

Invited speakers:

Kevin Blankespoor [Boston Dynamics, USA]; Prof. Sangbae Kim [MIT, USA]; Prof. Marco Hutter [ANYbotics/ETH Zurich, Switzerland]; Prof. Stelian Coros [ETH, Switzerland]; Dr. Andrea Del Prete, Prof. Ludovic Righetti [MPI, Germany]; Dr. Rafael Cisneros, Dr. Mehdi Benallegue, Prof. Fumio Kanehiro [AIST, Japan]; Prof. Jonathan Hurst [Agility Robotics, USA]; Dr. Olivier Stasse [CNRS, France]; Prof. Aaron Ames [Georgia Institute of Technology, USA]; Prof. Claudio Semini [IIT, Italy]; Dr. Avik De [Ghost Robotics, USA]; Xingxing Wang [Unitree Robotics, China]; Dr. Jerry Pratt, Dr. R. Griffin [IHMC, USA]; Prof. Luis Sentis [University of Texas at Austin, USA]

Organizers:

Bjelonic [ETH Zurich, Switzerland]; Dr. Dimitrios Kanoulas [IIT, Italy]; Prof. Krzysztof Walas [Poznan University of Technology, Poland]; Dr. Marco Camurri [University of Oxford, England]; Dr. Navinda Kottege [CSIRO, Australia]; Dr. Eiichi Yoshida [AIST, Japan]; Dr. Andrea Del Prete [MPI, Germany]; C. Dario Bellicoso [ETH Zurich, Switzerland]; Dr. Tirthankar Bandyopadhyay [CSIRO, Australia] Prof. Maurice Fallon [University of Oxford, England]; Prof. Ioannis Havoutis [University of Oxford, England]; Prof. Marco Hutter [ETH Zurich, Switzerland]

News “ICRA 2019 Workshop” from IEEE Spectrum:
entry.summary: Call for contribution at full day workshop "Towards Real-World Deployment of Legged Robots" at ICRA 2019 (May 23/24, 2019) in Montreal, Canada.

entry.title: Interview with RTL Aktuell
entry.content:
Interview with RTL Aktuell “ANYmal shows its skills on TV”:

ANYmal was featured on German news program RTL Aktuell. With 3 million average viewers, it is one of the most watched news programs on German language TV. ANYmal shows its locomotion and perception skills, interacts with the public, and demonstrates real-world applications.
entry.summary: Interview with RTL Aktuell “ANYmal shows its skills on TV”:
